text: Nozmifima mono'ma hunentaza anumzantmimo'za havi antahintahi nezamasamizage'za, zamene vahe'mo'za havige nehazage'za, ava'nama eri rukrahe'ma hu vahe'mo'za havige hu'za ava'na kea eri rukrahe hu'za vahe'mofona zamazeri haviza nehaze. E'ina hazage'za vahe'nimo'za sipisipi kva vahe omanige'za sipisipi afutamimo'za hazagrazankna nehazage'za, ha' vahe'mo'za eme zamazeri haviza nehaze.
